about_the_game:
Add the tropics to your life! The Plant Therapy Tropical Dreams DLC celebrates all things tropical, with a focus on new plants, adding over 65 new items to the cozy plant collecting game Plant Therapy.

Includes:
20+ new tropical plants, including orchids, a coffee plant, a goldfish plant and a new giant Monstera. Some bloom and some grow from sprouts!

New furniture: Rattan sofa, sisal rugs, lava lamps, and more.

New art: Bright and beautiful wallpapers, gallery art, and decorative pieces.

New pots with a focus on large and XL pots for those new lush plants.

And introducing: FROGBOT! A new bot to collect your coins.
